title: Tarea principal: Planea un viaje a cuenca de un fin de semana
description: Planea un viaje a cuenca de un fin de semana

subtasks.title: Destination Research
subtasks.description: Researching and selecting the destination and key attractions in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: A list of recommended places to visit and activities to do in Cuenca.
responsibilities: Identify popular tourist attractions in Cuenca.
Research cultural events or festivals happening during the weekend.

subtasks.description: Identify and research the most popular tourist attractions in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of top tourist attractions in Cuenca.

subtasks.expected_output: List of top historical sites in Cuenca.

subtasks.description: Conduct research to identify historical sites in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of historical sites in Cuenca.

subtasks.expected_output: List of notable natural landmarks in Cuenca.

subtasks.expected_output: List of potential natural landmarks in Cuenca.

subtasks.expected_output: List of cultural events or festivals in Cuenca.

subtasks.description: Identify all cultural events happening in Cuenca during the weekend.

subtasks.expected_output: List of cultural events happening in Cuenca during the weekend.

subtasks.title: Identify Local Cuisine and Dining Options
subtasks.description: Research and identify popular local cuisine and dining options in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended local restaurants and dishes to try.

subtasks.description: Conduct research to identify popular local restaurants in Cuenca known for their authentic cuisine.

subtasks.description: Research and compile a list of popular local restaurants in Cuenca known for their authentic cuisine.

subtasks.title: Explore Traditional Dishes
subtasks.description: Investigate traditional dishes and specialties of Cuenca to recommend to visitors.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended local dishes to try.

subtasks.title: Research Popular Local Dishes
subtasks.description: Identify the most popular traditional dishes in Cuenca.
subtasks.expected_output: List of the top 5 most popular local dishes.

subtasks.title: Analyze Ingredients and Preparation
subtasks.description: Investigate the ingredients and preparation methods of the identified traditional dishes.
subtasks.expected_output: Detailed information on the ingredients and cooking techniques used for each dish.

subtasks.title: Accommodation Booking
subtasks.description: Securing suitable accommodation for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of hotel reservation or alternative lodging arrangements.
responsibilities: Research and compare hotel options in Cuenca.
Make reservations based on budget and preferences.

subtasks.title: Research hotel options
subtasks.description: Research and compare different hotel options in Cuenca based on budget and preferences.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential hotels with details such as pricing, amenities, and location.

subtasks.title: Identify budget-friendly hotels
subtasks.description: Research and compile a list of hotels in Cuenca that fall within the specified budget range.
subtasks.expected_output: List of budget-friendly hotels with pricing information.

subtasks.title: Research hotels in Cuenca
subtasks.description: Conduct research to identify hotels in Cuenca that fall within the specified budget range.
subtasks.expected_output: List of hotels in Cuenca with pricing information.

subtasks.title: Evaluate hotel amenities
subtasks.description: Review the amenities offered by each hotel on the list to ensure they align with preferences.
subtasks.expected_output: List of hotels with amenities that match the user's preferences.

subtasks.title: Identify key amenities
subtasks.description: Review the list of amenities offered by each hotel and identify the key amenities that are essential for the user's preferences.
subtasks.expected_output: List of key amenities for each hotel.

subtasks.title: Check availability
subtasks.description: Verify the availability of rooms for the selected hotels on the chosen weekend dates.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of room availability for the desired dates.

subtasks.title: Search for available rooms
subtasks.description: Search for available rooms in the selected hotels for the chosen weekend dates.
subtasks.expected_output: List of hotels with available rooms for the desired dates.

subtasks.title: Check hotel availability
subtasks.description: Check the availability of rooms in the selected hotels for the chosen weekend dates.
subtasks.expected_output: List of hotels with available rooms for the desired dates.

subtasks.title: Check room rates
subtasks.description: Verify the room rates for the available rooms in the selected hotels.
subtasks.expected_output: Comparison of room rates for the available options.

subtasks.title: Retrieve room rates
subtasks.description: Gather the room rates for the available rooms in the selected hotels.
subtasks.expected_output: List of room rates for each available option.

subtasks.title: Compare room rates
subtasks.description: Analyze and compare the gathered room rates to identify the best option.
subtasks.expected_output: Recommended choice based on room rates.

subtasks.title: Make reservations
subtasks.description: Book the chosen hotel based on availability and preferences.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of hotel reservation for the weekend trip.

subtasks.title: Check hotel availability
subtasks.description: Verify the availability of the chosen hotel for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of hotel availability

subtasks.title: Search for available rooms
subtasks.description: Search the hotel's booking system for available rooms for the specified weekend dates.
subtasks.expected_output: List of available rooms for the chosen hotel.

subtasks.title: Confirm reservation details
subtasks.description: Verify the reservation details including check-in/out times, room type, and any special requests.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of all reservation details being accurate.

subtasks.title: Verify check-in/out times
subtasks.description: Confirm the check-in and check-out times with the guest and ensure they align with the reservation.
subtasks.expected_output: Accurate check-in and check-out times confirmed.

subtasks.title: Confirm check-in time
subtasks.description: Confirm the specific time the guest plans to check-in.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed check-in time.

subtasks.title: Confirm check-out time
subtasks.description: Confirm the specific time the guest plans to check-out.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed check-out time.

subtasks.title: Validate room type
subtasks.description: Verify the room type booked by the guest matches the reservation details.
subtasks.expected_output: Correct room type confirmed.

subtasks.title: Confirm room type with guest
subtasks.description: Contact the guest to confirm the room type they booked.
subtasks.expected_output: Guest confirmation received.

subtasks.title: Secure payment
subtasks.description: Ensure the payment for the hotel reservation is completed to secure the booking.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of successful payment and booking confirmation.

subtasks.title: Verify payment details
subtasks.description: Verify the accuracy of payment information provided by the user.
subtasks.expected_output: Payment information verified successfully

subtasks.title: Check credit card information
subtasks.description: Validate the credit card number, expiration date, and CVV provided by the user.
subtasks.expected_output: Credit card information verified successfully

subtasks.description: Determine the cost associated with each bus route to Cuenca.
